title: Battery-Ecosystem Verifiable Credential
description: Generic VC envelope with three supported claim types.

@context.description: Defines the JSON-LD context, providing meaning to terms used in the credential.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Verifiable Credential.

type.description: Specifies the type(s) of the credential, must include 'VerifiableCredential'.

issuer.description: Identifier representing the entity that issued the credential.

holder.description: Identifier of the entity that holds the credential.

issuanceDate.description: The date and time the credential was issued.

expirationDate.description: The date and time after which the credential is no longer valid.

credentialSubject.description: The subject of the credential, which must match one of the predefined claim types.

proof.description: Cryptographic proof that makes the credential verifiable.

type.description: The type of the digital signature used.

created.description: The timestamp, when the proof was created.

verificationMethod.description: The DID that identifies the public key used to verify the signature.

proofPurpose.description: The purpose for which the proof is provided

id.description: Unique identifier for the BMS production credential.

type.description: Type indicator for a BMS production event.

bmsDid.description: DID of the Battery Management System.

producedOn.description: Date when the BMS was produced.

lotNumber.description: Optional lot number for the BMS production.

id.description: Unique identifier for the service access credential.

type.description: Type indicator for a service access permission.

bmsDid.description: DID of the BMS to which access is granted.

accessLevel.description: Level of access granted (read or write).

validFrom.description: Start of the validity period for service access.

validUntil.description: End of the validity period for service access.
